name: Sms Sender by D I X Y
author: Dinura Sellapperuma

sections.description: Sms Sender by D I X Y is a simple yet powerful plugin to send SMS directly from your WordPress dashboard. It provides an easy-to-use interface for sending individual or bulk SMS messages, making it perfect for notifications, marketing campaigns, or any situation where you need to reach your audience quickly.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/sms-sender-by-dixy directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the Settings -> SMS Sender screen to configure the plugin. You'll need to enter your API key and sender mask.
  4. You're ready to start sending SMS!

sections.faq:
How do I get an API key?

You can obtain an API key by registering on our SMS gateway partner's website. Once registered, you'll find your API key in your account dashboard.

Can I send SMS to international numbers?

Nop, you can't send SMS to international numbers. Make sure to include the country code in the phone number.

Is there a limit to how many SMS I can send?

The limit depends on your SMS gateway plan. You can check your balance in the plugin's 'Check Balance' page.
